t: How do I provide an ASIN with my brand name for Brand Registry before I register a brand?
s: The Brand Registry application requires to "Enter 1-3 ASINs that represent your brand. The brand name on the application should match the brand name on the ASIN.". However the listing requires that "If you are not brand-registered, check the box for This product does not have a brand".
